001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
011110 00001 00000 0000000000000000     # sw $r1 $r0 0  # memory[0] = $r1

001001 00000 00010 0000000000000010     # addi $r0 $r2 2
011110 00010 00000 0000000000000100     # sw $r2 $r0 4  # memory[1] = $r2

001001 00000 00011 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r3 3
001001 00000 00100 0000000000000100     # addi $r0 $r4 4
011110 00011 00100 0000000000000100     # sw $r3 $r4 4  # memory[2] = $r3

001001 00000 00101 0000000000000101     # addi $r0 $r5 5
001001 00000 00110 0000000000010000     # addi $r0 $r6 16
011110 00101 00110 1111111111111100     # sw $r5 $r6 -4 # memory[3] = $r5

011100 00000 00001 0000000000000000     # lw $r0 $r1 0  # $r1 = memory[0]
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $1
00000000000000000000000000000001        # 1

001001 00000 00010 0000000000000100     # addi $r0 $r2 4
011100 00010 00001 0000000000000000     # lw $r2 $r1 0  # $r1 = memory[1]
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $1
00000000000000000000000000000010        # 2

001001 00000 00010 0000000000000010     # addi $r0 $r2 2
011100 00010 00001 0000000000000110     # lw $r2 $r1 6  # $r1 = memory[2]
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $1
00000000000000000000000000000011        # 3

001001 00000 00010 1111111111111100     # addi $r0 $r2 -4
011100 00010 00001 0000000000010000     # lw $r2 $r1 16  # $r1 = memory[3]
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $1
00000000000000000000000000000101        # 5

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
